parameterConfigurations.name: mer
parameterConfigurations.description: Modulation error ratio - a measure of the sum of all interference that affects a digital TV signal.

parameterConfigurations.name: pre_ber
parameterConfigurations.description: Bit error ratio before LDPC decoder

parameterConfigurations.name: post_ber
parameterConfigurations.description: Bit error ratio after BCH decoder

parameterConfigurations.name: tsStreamPresence
parameterConfigurations.description: Presence of data in TS stream

parameterConfigurations.name: descriptorPresence
parameterConfigurations.description: Presence of teletext descriptor in TS stream

parameterConfigurations.name: errorsPresence
parameterConfigurations.description: Presence of errors in teletext stream

parameterConfigurations.name: SUBTITLE_PRESENCE
parameterConfigurations.description: Presence of subtitles in teletext stream

parameterConfigurations.name: TS_sync_loss
parameterConfigurations.description: TS_sync_loss indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Indicates loss of synchronization with consideration of hysteresis parameters

parameterConfigurations.name: Sync_byte_error
parameterConfigurations.description: Sync_byte_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when Sync_byte not equal 0x47

parameterConfigurations.name: PAT_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PAT_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when PID 0x0000 does not occur at least every 0,5 s; when a PID 0x0000 does not contain a table_id 0x00 (i.e. a PAT); when Scrambling_control_field is not 00 for PID 0x0000

parameterConfigurations.name: PAT_error_2
parameterConfigurations.description: PAT_error_2 indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when sections with table_id 0x00 do not occur at least every 0,5 s on PID 0x0000; when Section with table_id other than 0x00 found on PID 0x0000; whenScrambling_control_field is not 00 for PID 0x0000

parameterConfigurations.name: Continuity_count_err
parameterConfigurations.description: Continuity_count_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when an incorrect packet order is detected; when a packet occurs more than twice; when a packet is lost

parameterConfigurations.name: PMT_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PMT_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when sections with table_id 0x02, (i.e. a PMT), do not occur at least every 0,5 s on the PID which is referred to in the PAT; when Scrambling_control_field is not 00 for all PIDs containing sections with table_id 0x02 (i.e. a PMT)

parameterConfigurations.name: PMT_error_2
parameterConfigurations.description: PMT_error_2 indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when sections with table_id 0x02, (i.e. a PMT), do not occur at least every 0,5 s on each program_map_PID which is referred to in the PAT; when Scrambling_control_field is not 00 for all packets containing information of sections with table_id 0x02 (i.e. a PMT) on each program_map_PID which is referred to in the PAT

parameterConfigurations.name: PID_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PID_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when PID does not occur for a user specified period

parameterConfigurations.name: Transport_error
parameterConfigurations.description: Transport_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when Transport_error_indicator in the TS-Header is set to "1"

parameterConfigurations.name: CRC_error
parameterConfigurations.description: CRC_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when CRC error occurred in CAT, PAT, PMT, NIT, EIT, BAT, SDT or TOT table

parameterConfigurations.name: PCR_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PCR_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when PCR discontinuity of more than 100 ms occurring without specific indication; when time interval between two consecutive PCR values more than 40 ms

parameterConfigurations.name: PCR_repetition_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PCR_repetition_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when time interval between two consecutive PCR values more than 40 ms

parameterConfigurations.name: PCR_disc_indicat_err
parameterConfigurations.description: PCR_discontinuity_indicator_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when the difference between two consecutive PCR values (PCR[i+1] - PCR[i]) is outside the range of 0...100 ms without the discontinuity_indicator set

parameterConfigurations.name: PTS_error
parameterConfigurations.description: PTS_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when PTS repetition period more than 700 ms

parameterConfigurations.name: CAT_error
parameterConfigurations.description: CAT_error indicator from ETSI TR 101 290. Incremented when packets with transport_scrambling_control not 00 present, but no section with table_id = 0x01 (i.e. a CAT) present; when section with table_id other than 0x01 (i.e. not a CAT) found on PID 0x0001

parameterConfigurations.name: subt_err_disp_perc
parameterConfigurations.description: Percentage of wrong displayable subtitles letters

parameterConfigurations.name: subt_err_all_perc
parameterConfigurations.description: Percentage of wrong subtitles symbols (including control symbols)

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.error_packets.nonzero
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of erroneous packets is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: Number of erroneous packets is avove threshold

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.mer.low
alertTypes.description: Low modulation error ratio

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.pre_ber.high
alertTypes.description: High value of bit error ratio before LDPC decoder

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.post_ber.high
alertTypes.description: High value of bit error ratio after BCH decoder

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.snr.low
alertTypes.description: Low value of signal/noise ratio

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.rssi.low
alertTypes.description: Low value of received signal strength indication

alertTypes.name: qos.DVBTErrControlModule.signal_present.none
alertTypes.description: Signal is not present

alertTypes.name: qos.IT09AControlModule.signalLevel.low
alertTypes.description: This indication warns about low signal level during a certain period. Low value of this parameter results in low quality of video.

alertTypes.name: qos.IT09AControlModule.signalNoise.low
alertTypes.description: This indication warns about low signal/noise ratio during a certain period. Low value of this parameter results in low quality of video.

alertTypes.name: qos.IT09AControlModule.hardware.missing
alertTypes.description: The IT09A control module hasn't found the hardware. Please check the equipment settings in the module configuration file.

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSSplicingControlModule.signalPresence.none
alertTypes.description: No signal present

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSSplicingControlModule.dpiStreamPresence.none
alertTypes.description: DPI stream is not present

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSStatisticsIPTVControlModule.audioBitrate.low
alertTypes.description: Low Audio Bitrate

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSStatisticsIPTVControlModule.videoBitrate.low
alertTypes.description: Low Video Bitrate

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSStatisticsIPTVControlModule.dataBitrate.low
alertTypes.description: Low Data Bitrate

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSTeletextControlModule.tsStreamPresence.none
alertTypes.description: No transport stream present

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSTeletextControlModule.descriptorPresence.none
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Teletext descriptor is not present in the transport stream
alertTypes.description: Teletext descriptor is not present in the transport stream

alertTypes.name: qos.MpegTSTeletextControlModule.teletextPESPresence.none
alertTypes.description: Teletext stream is not present

alertTypes.name: qos.T2ControlModule.silence
alertTypes.displayTemplate: No sound during more than 30 seconds
alertTypes.description: No sound during more than 30 seconds, or the volume is below configured threshold

alertTypes.name: qos.T2ControlModule.black_screen
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Black screen during more than 30 seconds
alertTypes.description: Black screen during more than 30 seconds

alertTypes.name: qos.T2ControlModule.no_signal
alertTypes.displayTemplate: No signal during more than 30 seconds
alertTypes.description: No Signal during more than 30 seconds

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290IPTVControlModule.TS_sync_loss.nonzero
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of times the TS sync was lost is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: The actual synchronization of the TS depends on the number of correct sync bytes necessary for the device to synchronize and on the number of distorted sync bytes which the device can not cope with.

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290IPTVControlModule.PAT_error.nonzero
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of PAT errors is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: The Program Association Table (PAT), which only appears in PID 0x0000 packets, tells the decoder what programs are in the TS and points to the Program Map Tables (PMT) which in turn point to the component video, audio and data streams that make up the program. If the PAT is missing then the decoder can do nothing, no program is decodable. Nothing other than a PAT should be contained in a PID 0x0000.

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290IPTVControlModule.PMT_error.nonzero
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of PMT errors is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: The Program Association Table (PAT) tells the decoder how many programs there are in the stream and points to the PMTs which contain the information where the parts for any given event can be found. Parts in this context are the video stream (normally one) and the audio streams and the data stream (e.g. Teletext). Without a PMT the corresponding program is not decodable.

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290p2IPTVControlModule.Transport_error.high
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of transport errors is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: Indicates high amount of erroneous TS packets.

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290p2IPTVControlModule.CRC_error.high
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of CRC errors is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: Indicates high amount of corrupted packets.

alertTypes.name: qos.TR101290p2IPTVControlModule.PCR_error.high
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Number of PCR errors is above ${threshold.warningLevel}. Value: ${current_value}
alertTypes.description: The PCRs are used to re-generate the local 27 MHz system clock. If the PCR do not arrive with sufficient regularity then this clock may jitter or drift. The receiver/decoder may even go out of lock. In DVB a repetition period of not more than 40 ms is recommended.

alertTypes.name: qos.TVStreamControlModule_v2.freeze
alertTypes.displayTemplate: The picture is not changing during more than 15 minutes
alertTypes.description: The picture is not changing during more than 15 minutes, or the magnitude of changes is below configured threshold

alertTypes.name: qos.TVStreamControlModule_v2.black_screen
alertTypes.displayTemplate: Black screen during more than 30 seconds
alertTypes.description: Black screen during more than 30 seconds
